nodes.text: Crossroads is a short story written by Christopher Cerasi, that was originally published on Hyperspace. It was released on August 22, 2008. On October 1, 2012, it was republished on Unbound Worlds, a subsidiary website of Random House publishing. The story takes place three months before The Courtship of Princess Leia.
In 8 ABY, Leia Organa visited Ta'a Chume on Hapes in a bid to forge an alliance between the New Republic and the Hapans.
